title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.9 - Westchester county taxi and limousine commission for-hire stickers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 174.9 - Westchester county taxi and limousine commission for-hire stickers

State Regulations

One licensed for-hire sticker may be displayed on the
inside of the front windshield, in the lower right hand corner on those motor
vehicles regulated by the Westchester County Taxi and Limousine Commission. Such stickers may not be of a size that would interfere with
visibility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
174.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
